topic.title: 中国的基本问题
topic.body:
中国的基本问题

关于中国的基本问题，有人认为是拥有数千万党员的“共产主义”政党造成的。这种看法夸大了矛盾的规模，恰好中了“伪共匿产帮”绑架数千万党员以及十几亿人民的阴谋诡计。

**中国的基本问题不是“中共”，而是“伪共匿产帮”。**

把目标从“中共”改为“伪共匿产帮”，部分年轻人可能觉得有点怪异。

需要做一些说明：
彻头彻尾的、绝对意义上的“无神论”信徒是不存在的，只要他不敢否认有“精神”存在，那么他就无法否认每个人的“精神”空间里都存在着或多或少的“神圣”的情感 — 这种“神圣”的情感，无论是在工作层面的，还是生活层面的，总是伴随着每个生命。 而只要有“神圣”的精神空间存在，就有“神灵”的属性存在于他的精神空间。 对于这一点，共产主义的鼻祖马克思非常雄辩，但也犯错误，即使他不信上帝，而是信仰撒旦魔鬼，撒旦魔鬼也仍然属于邪恶色彩的“神灵”，与“无神论”是自相矛盾的。

所以，在中国大陆，至少在中南海，那些连官僚财产都不敢公开的所谓“共党”根本就不配习仲勋那样的“共产主义“信徒之类的称呼，更准确的叫法应该是“伪共匿产帮”。
把目标对准一小撮“伪共匿产帮”，而不是囊括数千万基层党员的“共党”，既有应对时局险恶的现实考量，更是严谨的科学分析方法。这方面，请大家仔细思考，再付诸实行。
如此区分，可以清晰地把囊括数千万基层党员的“共党”，与一小撮“伪共匿产帮”完全区分开来。
采纳严谨的科学分析方法，可以让严峻而复杂的问题显得更简单一些，尽量减少大规模的冲突。

topic.title: When the internet is collapsed ….
topic.body:
What will happen if Hong Kong’s internet is collapsed?

If Hong Kong’s cyberspace is totally poisoned by the GFW virus, then it means Hong Kong’s internet would collapse to the atheism jungle level just like the situation in mainland, China. Since the crazy Hong Kong security law is much more brutal than the mainland, Chinese version, this possibility has to be considered by Hong Kong people. 

In such case, the decentralized website of Zeronet https://zeronet.io/ will serve as a good solution for people to transmit revolutionary messages. With Bitcoin cryptography, the safety is higher than Telegram.  As an innovation of web technology, there's not any censorship, even NO SMS verification process is required as incurred on Telegram.  The new Peer-to-Peer data transmission will be a new tide of cyberspace revolution. 

## **Users can make quasi-administrator’s customization of ZeroNet … **
Full details are available at the below URL:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1596087920_1PPHzUHjZ77arm8QhzTWpWL5H6ECqd9oeD/+quasi+administrator+s+customization+of+ZeroNet

Remarks:
1) More details about Zeronet:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/ 
The code 43110 represents the port used for secure data transmission by Bitcoin-encrypted technology.

1596775198_1KjezDT16Z47VxZasHVX4LLTb91h9.body:
For better convenience, the text content is posted here for more efficient discussion.
Every time we go to the bathroom and have a BM(Bowel Movement), some of the molecules that once was in our colon is now in our brain! Yaks!! A mask may help some!
每次我们去洗手间解手时，之前在我们结肠中活动的物质分子，现在跑到我们的大脑中！哎呀！口罩会有帮助！
Similarly, disease (Covid 19) is an airborne virus and is transmitted through the air. A mask will stop it from becoming part of your brain! Because it is a virus, it grows inside your nose and brain, that’s why one of the early symptoms is the loss of smells and taste.
同样，新冠病毒（Covid 19）是空气游离病毒，通过空气传播。口罩会阻止它，不让它跑到您大脑里面！因为它是一种病毒，它会在您的鼻子和大脑中复制、生长，这就是为什么感染病毒的早期症状之一就是 **嗅觉和味觉丧失**  的原因。
Please share this info. With your friends! A mask is our best defense against this disease.
请将此信息分享出去。分享给您的亲戚朋友们！口罩是我们抵抗这种疾病的最佳防御方法。

By the way, a cloth mask can be cleaned for reuse, by degerming in the microwave oven for 2 minutes. 
***    Be sure that there are no metal parts in it or you will start a fire.   ***
You can also wash it in a washer dryer with hot water and detergent. So be safe and wear a mask to protect yourself and others!  
**请确保布料口罩里面没有任何金属零件，否则将引起火灾。 **
您也可以用热水在洗碗机里面加洗涤剂清洗。
为了安全，请戴上口罩，保护您自己，也是保护您的家人！
愿上帝保佑大家平安！

If some atheists don’t like the word “holy”, then use scientific word “prudent”.  More and more people in the USA will learn to adopt more “prudent” attitude on the coronavirus, just like the atmosphere in Taiwan. 
Taiwanese people know the brutality of the atheism gang much better than American people.  Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-wen sent messages to the USA that the toxicity of Wuhan virus is very dangerous. But that important message was ignored by some politicians.

In a certain sense, the coronavirus, plus other cultural viruses produced by the atheism gang, has eroded American society seriously …
